A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't care for it simply because the low tier comedy broke the tension in every meaningful moment. Then any well structured moments weren't given enough time. I REALLY felt the Disney \"appeal to everyone and sell merch\" creed this time around. I liked the story and was surprised with how well cast the characters were\, it just felt like a movie where it was finished\, really well structured\, but then Disney's board said \"we need way more easy jokes for the kids\, and a sidekick to sell plushies.\"
